# Improved Feint (Feat)
## Overview
You are skilled at fooling your opponents in combat.

**Prerequisites**: Int 13, [[Combat Expertise (Feat)|Combat Expertise]].

**Benefit**: You can make a [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] check to feint in combat as a move action.

**Normal**: Feinting in combat is a standard action.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 127
